dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM ( SELECT ore.order_release_xid FROM order_release ore INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND ors.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING' AND ors.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING_PLANNED - HOLD' AND (ors.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_status WHERE (status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%'))) INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr ON ore.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND orr.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' INNER JOIN order_release ore1 ON orr.order_release_gid = ore1.order_release_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%' UNION SELECT ore.order_release_xid FROM order_release ore INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND ors.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING' AND ors.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING_PLANNED - HOLD' AND (ors.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_status WHERE (status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%'))) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%' AND ore.order_release_gid NOT IN (SELECT ore1.order_release_gid FROM order_release ore1 INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore1.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND ors.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING' AND ors.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING_PLANNED - HOLD' INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr ON ore1.order_release_gid = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND orr.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' INNER JOIN order_release ore1 ON orr.order_release_gid = ore1.order_release_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore1.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%'))

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT order_release_refnum_value FROM order_release_refnum WHERE order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' AND order_release_gid = ore.order_release_gid) loc_code_value FROM order_release ore INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND ors.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING' AND ors.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING_PLANNED - HOLD' AND (ors.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_status WHERE (status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%'))) INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr ON ore.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND orr.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' INNER JOIN order_release ore1 ON orr.order_release_gid = ore1.order_release_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%'

SELECT ore.order_release_xid po_number, ore.total_weight po_weight, orr1.order_release_refnum_value Loc_Code, (SELECT TO_CHAR (insert_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') FROM ob_order_base WHERE order_base_gid = ore.order_base_gid) insert_date, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ord_rel_item_fcn(ore.order_release_gid) item, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ordrel_idesc_fcn(ore.order_release_gid) item_desc, ore1.order_release_xid so_number, ore1.total_weight so_weight, (ore.total_weight - NVL( (SELECT SUM(ore2.total_weight) FROM order_release ore2 WHERE ore2.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_refnum orr1 WHERE orr1.order_release_refnum_value = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr1.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' AND orr1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER')),0)) difference FROM order_release ore INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND ors.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING' AND ors.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING_PLANNED - HOLD' AND (ors.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_status WHERE (status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%'))) INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr ON ore.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND orr.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr1 ON ore.order_release_gid = orr1.order_release_gid AND orr1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' INNER JOIN order_release ore1 ON orr.order_release_gid = ore1.order_release_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%' AND orr1.order_release_refnum_value = :loc_code_value

SELECT ore.order_release_xid po_number, ore.total_weight po_weight, orr1.order_release_refnum_value loc_code, (SELECT TO_CHAR(insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') FROM ob_order_base WHERE order_base_gid = ore.order_base_gid) insert_date, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ord_rel_item_fcn(ore.order_release_gid) item, GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ordrel_idesc_fcn(ore.order_release_gid) item_desc, NULL so_number, NULL so_weight, ore.total_weight difference FROM order_release ore INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr1 ON ore.order_release_gid = orr1.order_release_gid AND orr1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%' AND orr1.order_release_refnum_value = :loc_code_value AND ore.order_release_gid NOT IN (SELECT ore.order_release_gid FROM order_release ore INNER JOIN order_release_status ors ON ore.order_release_gid = ors.order_release_gid AND ors.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING' AND ors.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.PLANNING_PLANNED - HOLD' AND (ors.order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM order_release_status WHERE (status_type_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS%' AND status_value_gid LIKE '%CONTINUE_PRINTING_IN_CROSS_REPORTS_YES%'))) INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr ON ore.order_release_xid = orr.order_release_refnum_value AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PO NUMBER' AND orr.order_release_gid LIKE '%SE%' INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr1 ON ore.order_release_gid = orr1.order_release_gid AND orr1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%LOC_CODE%' INNER JOIN order_release ore1 ON orr.order_release_gid = ore1.order_release_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND ore.order_release_xid LIKE 'PE%' AND orr1.order_release_refnum_value = :loc_code_value)
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay,Month DD, yyyy ')) CURR_DATE from dual
